participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and nurturing. Enjoys sharing experiences and food with family.
participant_1.background: I'm not sure my height is relevant to the question. I have two kids I enjoy being on social media. I got hired last week at McDonald's. My favorite movie is Good Burger. I was able to make a delicious pie for my family even though my credit cards were maxed out.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and creative. Loves music and spending time at home with family.
participant_2.background: I have a baby mobile in my nursery that plays classical music to help my child sleep. I never told my parents about my deployment, but I would tell my friends all about it if I was famous. My favorite band is Nightwish. I'm a homebody, but I love my kids! My favorite food is pasta.

content.text: Nice to meet you, what's your favorite movie?
My favorite movie is Good Burger. What's yours?
My favorite movie is also Good Burger. I love the food puns in it.
Me too! And I love the music. Have you heard of Nightwish?
No, I haven't. What kind of music do they play?
They're a symphonic metal band. You should check them out.
I will. Thanks for the recommendation. What else do you like to do?
I like to stay home and be a homebody. I love cooking and baking.
Me too! I love to cook and bake. I'm actually a chef at McDonald's.
That's awesome! I've never been to McDonald's.
You should come by and try some of my food.
I will! Thanks for the offer.
You're welcome. It was nice meeting you.
